summary: The Voluntary Public Access Improvement Act of 2025 aims to reauthorize and amend the Food Security Act of 1985. It focuses on the Voluntary Public Access and Habitat Incentive Program, providing mandatory funding of $150,000,000 from the Commodity Credit Corporation for fiscal years 2025-2029.  The bill also allocates $3,000,000 to encourage public access to land with wetland reserve easements.
